name: dottily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is slightly strange or silly: They may be dottily eccentric, but they are kind and generous. She used to lean out of an upstairs window and call out dottily to the people who passed by. Related words
dotty
dottiness
More examplesFewer examples"I love swimming. In fact, I'm almost amphibious," she explains dottily.There is something dottily admirable in his refusal to accept any help.I'm completely, dottily, in love.She was very fond of her dottily eccentric uncle.British art has always been dottily romantic.
